title: Enhanced electrical properties of BNKT–BMN lead-free ceramics by CaSnO3 doping and their bioactive properties
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23048-23057
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03591G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lalita Tawee, Narongdetch Boothrawong, Suwanan Thammarong, Phanrawee Sriprapha, Waraporn Boontakam, Denis Russell Sweatman, Nopakarn Chandet, Chamnan Randorn, Gobwute Rujijanagul
The CSO additive enhanced the electrical and mechanical properties of 0.99BNKT–0.01BMN ceramics. Biological tests on x = 0.02CSO samples showed moderate apatite formation in the SBF test and good cell viability in the cytotoxicity test.
